titles.title: A bill to prohibit the transport of hydrolysate from the Pueblo Chemical Depot, Colorado, to an off-site location.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services under authority of the order of the Senate of 02/14/2008.
Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S1124-1125)

bill.summary:
2/15/2008--Introduced.
Prohibits the Secretary of Defense from transporting hydrolysate (derived from the neutralization of VX nerve gas) from the Pueblo Chemical Depot, Colorado, to an off-site location for treatment, storage, or disposal.
